name: Thea is Drowning
description:
Mermaids, by their very nature, breathe perfectly fine underwater.

Yet Thea is drowning, crushed by the weight of the sea.

This is a story about mental health, bad thoughts, and a mermaid.

  • Story by That Wannabe Cat (twitter).
  • Cover art by Vivid Grim (twitter, itch).

CW Descriptions of metaphorical drowning, anxiety and depression, bad thoughts, allusion to an abusive home, and self loathing.

Updates:

  • 03/02/21. Version 1.1. Added scroll bars, so the game can play properly on smaller devices (like phones).
